body:
well yeah I was banned for exessive infractions, a wrong ban, I had 9 infractions in 8 months and 3/4 days... So yeah it's 10 infractions in 8 months I was told so...(by mods)
Good job Zerkk

cya in a month 

tbh if I stay banned this is numpty worthy

title: I was banned.

replies.body: Excessive infractions is a bullshit thing to ban for but you definitely have 10 in the last 8 months
replies.body_tagged: Excessive infractions is a bullshit thing to ban for but you definitely have 10 in the last 8 months

replies.body:
It was 8 months and 3 days so a wrongful ban xD

and rules here are.... Let's say odd

replies.body: The ban is fine. The infractions that are 8 months old, don't count to anything. But considering you have had 10 in the past 6 months its a tempban.
replies.body_tagged: The ban is fine. The infractions that are 8 months old, don't count to anything. But considering you have had 10 in the past 6 months its a tempban.

LOL where did u get 6 months from?
i had 3 last year then the rest are from May to December that's 8 months
